name: mounts
start: if !mountpoint /proc > /dev/null 2>&1; then mount -t proc proc /proc; fi
if !mountpoint /sys > /dev/null 2>&1; then mount -t sysfs sysfs /sys; fi
if !mountpoint /dev > /dev/null 2>&1; then mount -t devtmpfs devtmpfs /dev; fi
if !mountpoint /run > /dev/null 2>&1; then mount -t tmpfs tmpfs /run; fi
if [ -f /etc/sysconfig/mounts ]; then . /etc/sysconfig/mounts; if [ "${MOUNT_TMPFS}" = "true" ]; then mount -t tmpfs tmpfs /tmp; fi; fi
